short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you download Pinterest Images and videos into your PC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pinterest Video & Image Downloader is a Google Chrome extension that allows users to easily download images and videos from Pinterest. With just a few clicks, users can save their favorite photos and videos to their computer device.

The extension is user-friendly and easy to use. Once installed, users can simply navigate to the Pinterest page containing the image or video they wish to download. The extension will automatically detect the media and display a download button, allowing the user to save the media file directly to their device.

⭐Best Features
✅ Fast & Secure Download
✅ User-friendly design
✅ No Ads & No Tracker
✅ Download in just 2 Steps
✅ Download Image or Video In High-Resolution

The Pinterest Video & Image Downloader extension supports a wide range of media formats, including JPEG, PNG, and MP4, among others.

Overall, the Pinterest Video & Image Downloader extension is a useful tool for anyone who regularly uses Pinterest and wants to save their favorite media files for offline use or personal collections. It is a quick and easy way to access and save high-quality images and videos from the platform, making it a valuable addition to any Pinterest user's toolkit.
